title: GGMF's Voiceover
body: I'm in love with GGMF's voiceover. the voice actress did a REALLY great job. I hope when MF is reworked, you guys use the same person :)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oB0TVmkI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-08T02:14:31.317+0000)
>
> Thanks for the feedback! =)

I concur.  GGMF has a great VO.

Really wish you guys took the opportunity to address the disconnect between the main game's VO and her new lore, though.  Chances like this don't  happen often and I feel like the company wasted it.

Honestly at this point they either have already done it or not(after all GGMFs VO is already finished).

We know that some Bilgewater stuff is coming after the Irelia VGU,so if they have recorded new voicelines for her,then that is probably the best time to release it.
Because its just bad praise that doesn't go into any details and can basically be called a shit post with how little effort was put into it
